title: Teacher, Teacher, Can't You See?
description: Children's Book on BULLYINGTeacher, Teacher, Can't You See? Blurb:Every child gets excited about the first few days of school--meeting the teacher and making new friends, especially. The teacher is busy doing all the wonderful things teachers do--preparing reading and math lessons and more--but doesn't notice a problem in her classroom. Whoever thought that happy smiles would turn into frowns all because of a classroom bully? What will the teacher do?See Book Trailer for "Teacher, Teacher, Can't You See?" on author's website!
author: Cherrye S. Vasquez
